name: San Juan Capistrano
shortDescription: Historic city known for its Spanish mission, charming downtown, and vibrant cultural heritage.
fullDescription: San Juan Capistrano is renowned for its rich history, centered around the famous Mission San Juan Capistrano, often called the 'Jewel of the Missions.' The city offers a quaint and picturesque downtown with unique shops, art galleries, and restaurants, all nestled within a community that embraces its heritage. Surrounded by rolling hills and close to the coast, it balances historic charm with modern living, attracting families and visitors who appreciate culture, nature, and small-town warmth.
heroImageAlt: Mission San Juan Capistrano with clear sky

neighborhoods.name: Dana Point
neighborhoods.description: Coastal city with a scenic harbor, beaches, and oceanfront parks just south of San Juan Capistrano.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Coastal bluff and ocean view representative of Dana Point

neighborhoods.name: San Clemente
neighborhoods.description: Beach city known for its pier, Spanish Colonial architecture, and relaxed surf culture.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Coastal shoreline representative of San Clemente

neighborhoods.name: Laguna Niguel
neighborhoods.description: Upscale suburban community with parks, trails, and rolling hills northwest of SJC.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Green hills and suburban homes representative of Laguna Niguel

neighborhoods.name: Mission Viejo
neighborhoods.description: Master-planned city with lakeside recreation, parks, and family neighborhoods north of SJC.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Suburban neighborhood street representative of Mission Viejo

highlights.title: Mission San Juan Capistrano
highlights.description: Historic Spanish mission founded in 1776, known for its beautiful architecture and annual swallows return event.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Mission San Juan Capistrano building facade

highlights.title: Los Rios Historic District
highlights.description: One of California‚Äôs oldest neighborhoods featuring preserved homes, shops, and dining in a charming setting.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Adobe homes and streets in Los Rios district

highlights.title: San Juan Capistrano Regional Library
highlights.description: Modern library with extensive resources, community programs, and events for all ages.

highlights.title: Outdoor Recreation
highlights.description: Hiking trails, parks, and nearby beaches provide residents with ample outdoor activities year-round.

faqs.question: What is San Juan Capistrano famous for?
faqs.answer: The city is best known for the historic Mission San Juan Capistrano and the annual return of the swallows.

faqs.question: How are the schools in San Juan Capistrano?
faqs.answer: San Juan Capistrano is served by Capistrano Unified School District, featuring highly-rated public and private schools.

faqs.question: What outdoor activities can residents enjoy?
faqs.answer: Residents enjoy hiking, horseback riding, and beach activities nearby, including the nearby Dana Point coastline.

faqs.question: How is the commute from San Juan Capistrano?
faqs.answer: The city has easy access to the I-5 freeway, with commute times to major employment centers in Orange County and Los Angeles ranging from 30 to 60 minutes.
